Severe cyclonic storm #Remal, which brought with it heavy #rains and strong winds in parts of #WestBengal and #Bangladesh, killed at least 3 people, and cut #electricity supply to millions before it weakened into a cyclonic storm. The storm snapped power lines, uprooted poles and #trees and blew roofs off thatched houses while rain and high tides damaged embankments. Heavy downpours also inundated streets and homes in low-lying areas of #Kolkata city. Cyclone Remal weakened considerably after making landfall in Bangladeshâ€™s Patuakhali district early in the morning with sustained 111 kph (69 mph) winds. The Meteorological Department in #Dhaka said the winds were now 90 kph (56 mph) with gusts to 120 kph (75 mph). The #India Meteorological Department said Remal was likely to weaken further throughout the day.

ğŸ”´ Zomato subsidiariesâ€™ auditor, EY, resigns with immediate effect. But why? And, whoâ€™s the new auditor? Let me answer all your questions ğŸ‘‡ ğŸ”¹ Food delivery giant Zomato recently announced the resignation of the statutory auditor for 2 of its wholly-owned subsidiaries, Hyperpure by Zomato (Zomato Hyperpure Pvt. Ltd.) and Blinkit (Blink Commerce Pvt. Ltd). ğŸ”¹ The resignation of SR Batliboi & Associates (EY) is effective from May 12, 2024. Who is the new auditor, you may ask? It's Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP. But why did it happen? ğŸ‘‰ The change is expected to bring a synchronized and efficient audit process that aligns closely with the companyâ€™s overall management strategy and financial planning. ğŸ‘‰ This alignment aims to streamline the audit of consolidated accounts, reduce redundancy, and improve efficiency at the group level. ğŸ‘‰ The management of the Holding Company (Zomato Limited) intends to appoint the same auditors for the subsidiaries and the Holding Company (Deloitte). ğŸ“Œ What will be the Impact on Zomatoâ€™s business and operations? Zomatoâ€™s operations consists of two companies - Hyperpure (B2B Kitchen Supplies) and Blinkit (Quick Commerce). They believe this will boost efficiency and revised strategies like raising order fees and halting legends intercity delivery. There is nothing adverse in the resignation submitted to the stock exchanges. Do share your thoughts in the comments. Follow CA Archit Agarwal to get the quick delivery of latest Accounting & Finance news. Source: Corporate Announcements, BSE & NSE #zomato #blinkit #deloitte #ey #auditor #resignation
